name: Familial melanoma
definition: Familial melanoma (FM) is a rare inherited form of melanoma characterized by development of histologically confirmed melanoma in two first degrees relatives or more relatives in an affected family.

ICD-10.relation: BTNT (ORPHAcode is broader than the targeted code used to represent it)

UMLS.relation: E (Exact mapping: the two concepts are equivalent)

GARD.relation: E (Exact mapping: the two concepts are equivalent)

OMIM.relation: BTNT (ORPHAcode is broader than the targeted code used to represent it)

ICD-11.relation: NTBT (ORPHAcode is narrower than the targeted code used to represent it)
